OCC: I talked to Orchid and she said she wanted a new character to be made =
from Drazom, but she didn't want it to be anything like Drazom.

Train Wrec=
k works on Drazom. He looks at all of the sparks they had in storage.

"Now=
 how did this one get in here? This spark was never in a deathmatch!" Train=
 Wreck said.

"So how did it get in there?" Stranato asked. Train Wreck shr=
ugged. He took the spark, curious to find out who it is, he put it in the f=
ormer body of Drazom, which was remade into whatever Orchid wants it to be,=
 whatever, it looks nothing like Drazom. Train Wreck and the rest of the Ra=
dicons wait for the robot to come to life...
  ----- Original Message -----=
 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, June=
 29, 2000 10:21 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  (OOC: I want to bring =
in a new character. I already have an idea..)
    ----- Original Message --=
--- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, Jun=
e 29, 2000 9:08 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    Stranato was confu=
sed now, this bot seemed to die sad. First he wanted to die, he should have=
 been happy, but he seemed so sad to die, the knife had no affect, he froze=
 to death. Stranato sighed, this was the part of his job he hated. Stranato=
 picked up Drazom's body and carried it back to the Radicon's wrecked ship,=
 which served as their base. Stranato set Drazom's body on a table.

    "A=
ny way we can bring him back? We can reprogram him to serve us." Stranato s=
aid.

    "I don't think so, his spark looks to be extinguished, sorry poor=
 fellow, we couldn't save ya." Train Wreck said.

    "I shouldn't have sta=
bbed him." Stranato said.

    "It wasn't you who killed him, he froze to d=
eath, just sorry he didn't make it." Train Wreck said.

    "No, you don't =
understand, I tried to kill him, I'm no better than the cold! I don't under=
stand why I did something like that, maybe it was the cold." Stranato said.=
 He sighed.

    "Maybe I'm just a son of a--"

    "No, you are acting stu=
pid now! Your murderer curcuits blocked out your intelligence circuits and =
your logic circuits." Train Wreck said, interupting Stranato.

    "I hope =
your right." Stranato said. Train Wreck looked at the body.

    "We could =
always put a new spark in his body" Train Wreck said. Stranato sighed and s=
at in the corner.

    "We could have used him, and instead we let him die =
and didn't save him, and I tried to kill him myself." Stranato said.

    O=
CC: Orchid, the Radicons could put a new spark from their spark collection =
(From deathmatches!) into Drazom's body if you want to have a new character=
 with Drazoms body, Orchid. Orchid, I could have them change the body and y=
ou can bring in a new character without having him or her look like Drazom =
at all, your choice, you can just have them get rid of his body even, just =
pick something, please...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: i=
lovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, June 29=
, 2000 8:37 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      *The knife hit Dra=
zom's back. He didn't scream or anything. It was already snowing which made=
 him even colder. Mech fluid begins pouring out of his back* Drazom:.......=
..... *Drazom's head hits the ground. It wasn't really the knife. It was co=
ldness. Drazom's spark fades out and he lies there......and mutters one wor=
d..* Drazom:....Mantella....... *Drazom's optics flicker and fade out* *He =
lived to love....he lived to die.....That was a queston that would never be=
 answered*





      (OOC: Please Drazom on the Deceased bots page. as tha=
t he died from the lack of emch fluid and because of how cold it was)
     =
   ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 6:54 PM
        Subject:=
 Re: Neo Beast Wars


        The Radicons had walked off and left Drazom, =
but now they were walking back and they seen him again. Airbomber laughed.
=

        "There's the guy I saved, I wonder why he wants to die?" Airbomber=
 asked.

        "I don't know, but I will oblige his needs!" Stranato said=
. Stranato walked up behind Drazom slowly. Stranato pulled out a knife, som=
ething he had stolen from the People's Base, and plunged it down, the knife=
 screaming toward Drazom's back.

        Stronghold and Blender took a sip=
 of their beer.

        "Why does that guy want to die, though?" Arrow ask=
ed.

        "Some bots are crazy." Train Wreck said, the 5 Radicons watchi=
ng Stranato...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilov=
ealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Wednesday, J=
une 28, 2000 7:01 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          *Dra=
zom slowly turns his head and looks at The Radicons* Drazom:....no......I m=
ust...die for.....my stupidity...of....messing up with......Mantella..... *=
Drazom's optics widen as he remembers something* Drazom:...hey....I'm a Pre=
d.....I AM!.....kill me........*Drazom pulls hisself up by a tree limb and =
mech fluid pours out of his side and he falls back to the ground shivering =
from how cold it is getting from the lack of mech fluid*
            ----- =
Original Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
            Sent: Tuesday, June 27, 2000 10:59 PM
            S=
ubject: Neo Beast Wars


            Train Wreck walked away from the battl=
e, Plintissa and Stronghold run away. Stranato, not seeing any point in con=
tinuing the battle, ran off with them. Scamrock followed with a grunt from =
being outnumbered. Artist laughed and ran after them as well.

            =
"Know what my names gonna be now? I'm going to be Blender!" Scamrock said.
=

            "Who cares about you?" Stranato asked. Stronghold reached out =
to grab Stranato but he cartwheeled out of the way.

            "We left t=
hat idiot Arrow in your CR Chamber, Plintissa." Stronghold said.

         =
   "WHAT!?" Stranato yelled.

            "It's my base, and Arrow is welco=
me to be repaired there and so are the other former Radicons!" Plintissa ye=
lled.

            The Radicons nodded and walked on, Stranato grumbled out=
 something that none of them, could understand. Airbomber seen them and wav=
ed to them. The People's Base's secret passageway was in the nearby swamp.
=

            "Get ready!" Train Wreck said to Airbomber.

            "What=
 about this guy?" Airbomber asked.

            "Never mind him." Train Wre=
ck said. Airbomber drug Drazom out of the water and ushered him to come alo=
ng while he walked with his comrades.

            Dracona was getting furi=
ous, and so was Gangon.

            "Sorry Gangon, I did all I could, mayb=
e BrightBlade will still show up anyway." Dracona said. Gangon waited while=
 Dracona flew away.

            "Hey! Wait! You forgot to untie meeeee!" G=
angon screamed.

            Dracona didn't hear and landed next to the Peo=
ple's Group members. The Radicons, Plintissa, Dracona, and Artist all enter=
ed the Poeple's base through the secret passage way, the computer reconizin=
g them as friends. Train Wreck and Airbomber stepped into a door.

        =
    "Hey, Stranato, look at this! It's amazing!" Train Wreck called out. Ar=
row steps out of the CR Chamber all healed up.

            "Yeah, it's got=
 lots of beer and cigars in here, too! and it's big enough to put a table i=
n to play cards! How come we never noticed this room before?" Airbomber sai=
d. Stranato walked into the room. Stronghold and Blender followed.

       =
     "Wait up guys!" Arrow called out, running into the room. Plintissa sea=
led the door magnetically upon order from Train Wreck, the Radicons were lo=
cked inside the room to sort out their problems. There was alot of banging,=
 but it eventually stopped. Alot of name calling, too. Plintissa laughed an=
d sat down at a table to play cards with Dracona.

            "Oh, man! No=
t even a drop of beer in here! We'll dehydrate drinking water!" Stronghold =
said.

            "What are we going to do? Nothing to smoke!" Blender sai=
d.

            "I have more needs than all of you idiots put together! I'm=
 getting fat and need to exercise!" Stranato yelled.

            "How come=
 we can't all get along! I don't like it in here neither!" Arrow said. Stra=
nato looked at him like he was going to kill him. Arrow cowered in the corn=
er.

            "You see? That's why you fail, Arrow, you don't stand up a=
gainst Stranato and his stupid rules! This was our idea!" Train Wreck yelle=
d.

            "Yeah, and nobody is getting out of here until we are all f=
riends again." Airbomber said.

            Stranato sighed in disapointmen=
t. Arrow stood up again, and started pacing the room. Stronghold and Blende=
r started to look in cracks in the wall for something to drink, despite ple=
nty of water in this room. Train Wreck was discussing something with Arrow =
and Airbomber, and Stronghold and Blender joined them before long.

       =
     "Say, you guys, it's really lonely sitting here with nothing to do, an=
d--"

            "Shut up and get your ass over here! Of course you can jo=
in us!" Arrow said, cutting off Stranato. Stranato walks over and sits with=
 them. Stronghold pulls out a pack of playing cards.

            Plintissa=
 and Dracona smile to each other and walk up and out of the secret passgewa=
y, taking a walk across a field...

---------------------------------------=
-------------------------------------
